project_description:
Permit only for Concrete pad 60x43 2,508 sq ft 
**Will add structure in the future, will require a separate permit.**
*NOT HOMESTEAD PER DCAD*
reasoning: Homeowner pulling permit for a large concrete pad (2,508 sq ft) shows high intent and immediate need. Property value ($582k) indicates solid ability to pay, and the lead is still within the 30-day freshness window for concrete work.
flags: NOT HOMESTEAD (may indicate investment property, but owner present)|Owner name includes '&' (possible partnership or business)
